price: (78) Establish prayer at the decline of the sun [from its meridian] until the darkness of the night[767] and [also] the Qur’ān [i.e., recitation] of dawn.[768] Indeed, the recitation of dawn is ever witnessed.
arabic: أَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِدُلُوكِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ إِلَىٰ غَسَقِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡفَجۡرِۖ إِنَّ قُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡفَجۡرِ كَانَ مَشۡهُودٗا
footnotes:
[767]- i.e., the period which includes the ẓuhr, aṣr, maghrib, and ʿishā’ prayers.
[768]- i.e., the fajr prayer, in which the recitation of the Qur’ān is prolonged.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: aqimi al-ṣalata lidulūki al-shamsi ilā ghasaqi al-layli waqur'āna al-fajri inna qur'āna al-fajri kāna mashhūdan
